Name: maximize_project_budget
Description: Maximize the total budget allocated across all projects

Name: maximize_team_size
Description: Maximize the total number of team members across all teams

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the availability of workers for sprint assignments

Name: minimize_feature_estimated_effort
Description: Minimize the sum of estimated effort for all features

Name: maximize_sprint_achievement_of_goal
Description: Maximize the average goal achievement rate across sprints

Name: maximize_sprint_velocity
Description: Maximize the team's average velocity in story points

Name: minimize_sprint_duration
Description: Minimize the total duration of sprints across projects

Name: maximize_user_story_story_points
Description: Maximize the total story points completed in sprints

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the average severity of active blockers

Name: maximize_release_plan_included_features
Description: Maximize the number of features included in release plans

Name: maximize_documentation_change_log
Description: Maximize the frequency of updates in feature documentation

Name: minimize_worker_start_date
Description: Assign workers who started earlier (favor experience)

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort spent on tasks per sprint

Name: maximize_roadmap_milestones
Description: Maximize the number of achieved milestones in the roadmap
